title: Spreading hate against Indians is this guys hobby
selftext:
https://youtube.com/@cowdians?si=8D881LuXLH7R1GQ7
Why is it still up. It's it aginst YouTubes guidelines.
comments: He has 256 subscribers. How’d you even find this channel, and why do you care? There are plenty of anti-America and anti-Europe channels out there, too.
